actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Bunning-Bereuter-Blumenauer Flood Insurance Reform Act of 2004 to require insurance agents who sell flood insurance policies under the National Flood Insurance Program to take certain continuing educational courses, and for other purposes.
short_title: Flood Insurance Continuing Education and Training Act

summary.text:
Flood Insurance Continuing Education and Training Act

This bill amends the Bunning-Bereuter-Blumenauer Flood Insurance Reform Act of 2004 to require insurance agents selling flood insurance policies to complete a continuing education course every two years.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Bunning-Bereuter-Blumenauer Flood Insurance Reform Act of 2004 to require insurance agents who sell flood insurance policies under the National Flood Insurance Program to take certain continuing educational courses, and for other purposes.
